> Hello Harish,
> 
> After Downloading  the junit from junit.org, unzip
> junit.jar and add it to your class path.
> 
> Run the sample tests to ensure junit is installed
> correctly.
> 
> For futher details regarding installation see junit
> faqs
> 
> With regards
> Vara Prasad
